title: Developing Second Language Comprehension Strategies Through Multimodal Learning (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language proficiency and intermediate expertise in science-related fields
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service/in-service teachers to improve second-language comprehension in science. Accessing and analyzing multimodal resources via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can summarize second-language science lecture content with over 80% accuracy by combining multiple modalities (audio, video, subtitles).
Learners can compare vocabulary interference phenomena under L1/L2 subtitle conditions and select optimal comprehension strategies.
Learners enhance their instructional design capabilities as pre-service teachers by developing three or more multimodal resource utilization strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
